newsitem.title: USA: Atrion completes sale of pipeline units.
newsitem.headline: Atrion completes sale of pipeline units.

text.p: Atrion Corp said on Friday it completed the sale of its natural gas pipeline and marketing subsidiaries to Midcoast Energy Resources Inc for about $39.4 million in cash.
Atrion previously announced it would post a gain of $17 million in the second quarter from the sale of the natural gas pipeline and marketing subsidiaries.
The gain increased the company's book value per share to $16 a share from $11 a share, Atrion said in a statement.

The sale, which was approved by Atrion's stockholders at its annual meeting held May 29, is part of the company's plan to redeploy its assets in higher growth areas like the medical products industry.
